clause_summary: Prepayment allowed only after 24 months with 5% penalty
recommended_action: Highlight prepayment penalty to user and suggest negotiation for lower fee

clause_summary: Lessee must pay for all maintenance and insurance
recommended_action: No action, just explain maintenance responsibility to user

clause_summary: Late payment fee of 3% per month on outstanding amount
recommended_action: Flag clause and suggest user request cap on late fee

clause_summary: Floating interest rate linked to lender's internal benchmark
recommended_action: Explain floating rate risk and suggest asking for external benchmark or cap

clause_summary: Early termination fee equal to 6 months of EMI
recommended_action: Flag as risky and suggest negotiating lower termination fee
Mark as positive clause, no action required

clause_summary: Battery warranty covered only for 24 months or 40,000 km
recommended_action: Warn user about battery risk and suggest extended warranty discussion

clause_summary: Mandatory bundled insurance from lender at non-refundable premium
recommended_action: Flag as unfair tying and suggest independent insurance quote

clause_summary: Security deposit of 3 EMIs, refundable at end of lease subject to damage check
recommended_action: Explain condition for refund, low risk

clause_summary: Processing fee of 1.5% of loan amount, non-refundable
recommended_action: Highlight cost and suggest user negotiate lower fee

clause_summary: Lessor can repossess vehicle after 2 consecutive missed payments without court order
recommended_action: Strongly warn user and recommend clarification / negotiation
